metadata.title: CVE-2019-3685 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Open Build Service before version 0.165.4 diddn't validate TLS certificatesfor HTTPS connections with the osc client binary

criterions.comment: osc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
